items.title: More than one in 10 surgical patients face food insecurity
items.description: Food insecurity is a significant burden among U.S. surgical patients, according to a study published online June 18 in JAMA Surgery.

items.title: Dietary patterns influence development of overactive bladder
items.description: Dietary patterns influence the development of overactive bladder (OAB), according to a study published online May 12 in Frontiers of Nutrition.
